name: Chhavi Arora
position: Bajaj Finserv 30 under 30|Data Scientist @Bajaj Finserv Health| Summer Analyst @Barclays'21
about: Data Scientist with 2 years of hands-on experience in leveraging data to drive business insights and facilitate informed decision-making. Possess a fair understanding of database systems, data manipulation, visualization, data integration techniques, and statistical analysis using tools such as Python, SQL, and PowerBI. Demonstrated ability to derive actionable insights from complex data sets, contributing to improved operational efficiency and strategic planning. Proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify business opportunities and implement data-driven solutions. Eager to leverage expertise in data analysis and visualization to contribute to innovative projects and drive organizational success.

current_company.name: Bajaj Finserv Health
